name: Square Sprint
description:
Square Sprint is a speed run click fest! Make your way through 10 levels of squares as fast as possible.

Built for Ludum Dare 32 #LDJAM

Notes:

  • Left click to charge
  • Right click to warp
  • [M] mute
  • [ESC] return to menu
  • Works best in Chrome

Dev Tech:
  • HTML5/JavaScript
  • Canvas Query
  • Playground.js
  • Sublime Text
  • Photoshop
  • FL Studio
  • Bfxr
  • Google Chrome
